import React from 'react' import Select from "../../../Layouts/Select/Select" import Btn from "../../../Layouts/Btn/Btn" import styles from './Filters.module.scss' const Filters = () => { const providerList = [ { label: 'Мегафон', code: '1' }, { label: 'Ростелеком', code: '1' }, ] const tariffList = [ { label: 'Интернет+ТВ+Мобильный', code: '1' }, { label: 'Интернет', code: '2' }, { label: 'ТВ+Мобильный', code: '3' }, { label: 'Интернет+Мобильный', code: '4' }, ] return (
) } export default Filters
